events.content: Modified autoSave to accept SESSION_END data and create handoff from it when ledger is empty: Modified autoSave to accept SESSION_END data and create handoff from it when ledger is empty

raw.question: Modified autoSave to accept SESSION_END data and create handoff from it when ledger is empty
raw.chosen: Modified autoSave to accept SESSION_END data and create handoff from it when ledger is empty
raw.reasoning: Root cause: autoSave created handoff from ledger which was empty when agent didn't use ->continuity:save. Fix: use SESSION_END JSON content to populate handoff directly.

retrospective.summary: Fixed empty continuity handoff files by passing SESSION_END JSON content to autoSave. Modified ContinuityManager.autoSave to accept optional sessionEndData and use it to populate handoff when ledger is empty. Updated both pty-wrapper.ts and tmux-wrapper.ts to store and pass sessionEndData.
